Oleg picks it up.  We hear Emil's voice in

An unshaven Czech in his mid-30's.  Tall, scraggly beard. Piercing blue eyes.  He's dressed in an outdated suit.  His eyes are alert, cunning and smart.

direction.raw_text: .B. HERMAN'S RESTAURANT - DAY The place is empty except for one table at the end of the bar.  EDDIE FLEMMING, Manhattan's most famous detective, and his savvy, black partner, LEON JACKSON are having cocktails. Eddie is smoothly handsome, tough, smart and tired.  Not only is he the best homicide detective Manhattan has ever seen, he's continually mentioned in New York columns and has been the subject of several magazine articles.  There's even been a TV movie about one of his biggest cases.  Leon has been with Eddie a long time and was also featured in the TV movie. Sitting with Eddie and Leon is ROBERT HAWKINS, host and star reporter for the tabloid show, "Top Story."  Hawkins is also the best in the business and has dealt with them all: Joey Buttafuco and Amy Fisher, Lorena Bobbit and OJ. Wait staff bustles in the b.g. doing the morning set up. Hawkins listens as Eddie, cigar in hand, finishes a "war story" and a vodka tonic at the same time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So we're waitin' to hit this warrant - we got Emergency Service with the heavy weapons standin' by - ready to go.  I say, lemme get a cigar outta the car.  I go to get the cigar and BOOM!  All the sudden I turn around and a kid with a shotgun let one go.  Right where I was standin'.  That coulda been it.  I coulda had my head blown off and for what?  Some stupid kid got panicky, takes the safety off and it's over.  If I hadn't gone back for that cigar - for a bad habit - I would've had my head blown off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus Christ.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: the owner, walks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Speakin' of bad habits, everybody okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Another martini.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Coffee for me, I gotta slow down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vodka tonic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe you could just put in a shot of Martell? Paulie takes the drinks off the table and an empty bottle of vodka.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was freaky, I'll tell you.  Stupid kid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the kid gonna say - sorry? Meanwhile I'm not here anymore. Like last week - we were at the morgue and this guy was all chopped up - spleen here - liver there - his heart in a pan. Six hours ago this guy was walkin' his dog or buyin' a quart of milk.  Who knows?  But some kid's robbed him for $3 or some shit and shot him and now you can't tell if he's a piece of beef or a human being and I'm thinkin' that's me. Sooner or later.  That's me. HAWKINS Sooner or later that's everybody. EDDIE Not chopped up.  Not chopped up like that.  I mean, what do I got left? Coupla articles.  A medal or two. Plaque here and there and in a coupla years no one remembers me anymore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you're getting a little moody there, Eddie.

direction.raw_text: I'm not moody. Hawkins and Leon share a look.

direction.raw_text: Isn't he a little moody?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course he's moody.  He thinks he's in love.

direction.raw_text: In love?  With who? Paulie delivers the drinks and sets some cigars on the table. Takes a seat next to Eddie.  Eddie asks Hawkins.

direction.raw_text: How old are your kids?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My kids?  Let's see...Susan's 15. Aundrea's 9.  Don't tell me you're thinking about having a kid!  How old are you?  Never mind. Let me just tell you this: Every stupid cliche you hear about kids - they change your life, they make you a better person, they make you whole... (beat) It's all true!  Before I had kids when friends talked about their kids, I wanted to vomit.  Now -- I get it.  Am I right, Leon?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Absomotherfuckin'lutely.  You can have all three of my ex-wives.  But somebody so much as looks sideways at my four girls -- I'd kill 'em. (takes out his wallet) You haven't seen my youngest have you? As he hands pictures to Hawkins his cell phone rings.

direction.raw_text: Yeah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Paulie, you've got kids, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My kids don't talk to me anymore but they were great when they were young.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure it's him?  Great! (collapses the phone) Unique's home. They all rise from the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Paulie, I need the cure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Step into my office. Leon and Hawkins sit back down as Eddie and Paulie leave.

direction.raw_text: So you got your kids listening to Opera? You still singing in the church on the weekends?

direction.raw_text: The thrill of the hunt.  I love it.

direction.raw_text: Look.  Times Square.  Just like in the movies!

direction.raw_text: Because I don't like your ugly language. I heard enough of it in school!  Now speak Czech or English.  And don't fool around anymore.  You almost got us thrown out! Emil pulls out an envelope with Milos' address on it.  This is who they came to see.  Emil hails a CAB.  Oleg is staring inside a camera store - at himself on a monitor.  A videocamera's pointed out in the street.

direction.raw_text: Here. Emil looks out the window - no sign of Oleg.  Then, Oleg hurries out the camera store, gripping something inside his coat.  He flings both suitcases in the trunk, SLAMS it shut and jumps in the back seat.  He opens his jacket - pulling out the VIDEOCAMERA he just stole.

direction.raw_text: Go! Oleg smiles sheepishly at Emil.

direction.raw_text: Yeah.  I make big cases, they make the news and I look good.  But the problem with becoming a star is downtown.  They shoot at stars.  Now be quiet.  Shhh. As they reach the doorway - Eddie surprises two crackheads. Waves them off.  They hurry away.

direction.raw_text: I hope this prick doesn't run.  My knees are killing me.  Stay behind me.

direction.raw_text: Ready?

direction.raw_text: !  COME ON!  YOU FUCKING GUYS, LET'S MOVE IT! Unique is climbing down the fire escape - before he gets to the bottom, Leon bursts through a door behind him and kicks the fire escape, sending Unique flying into the alley.  Where he lands dropping his gun. Eddie pulls him off the ground as Leon scoops the gun up.

direction.raw_text: What's your rush?  Going to a party?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why you chasin' me, man?

direction.raw_text: Again?  I didn't wanna do it the first time.

direction.raw_text: The cab is in front of an old five-story brownstone.  Oleg gets the bags out of the trunk as Emil tucks the envelope into his jacket, then steps up to the old building.  He looks back at Oleg - who's VIDEOTAPING him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Turn that off!  Get the bags.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why should I carry your bag?  I am not a dog.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For five years I paid for your stupidness - you'll carry my bag for the rest of my life if I say so. (challenging) Unless you refuse, Oleg. Oleg looks at Emil.  Even though Oleg is stronger than Emil, he fears him.  He picks up both bags.  Emil searches the occupant list over the buzzers to the apartment building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There.  5RW. Emil pushes ten of the buzzers except 5RW.  A BUZZER clicks and Emil pushes it open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The brownstone has no elevator so Emil and Oleg climb the stairs... Oleg cradling his camera.  Emil notices a crack pipe on the floor and picks it up.  Smells the bowl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Smell like chemicals...for smoking drugs. Emil pockets the pipe and climbs to the top floor, moving down the dirty hallway to a corner door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He KNOCKS...FOOTSTEPS approach.  The door is opened by MILOS - a 40-year-old Czech, dressed in stained plumbers overalls. He  is surprised to see Emil and Oleg in his doorway.  Oleg films him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Emil???!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Surprise!  Surprise! Milos shoots a look across the tiny kitchen to TAMINA, his comely wife.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: HUGE SONY TRINITRON HOME ENTERTAINMENT CENTER

direction.raw_text: Emil pushes his way inside.  Oleg follows.  Milos wears plumbers overalls but Emil notices sports a Rolex.  Tamina has on a faded dress but despite their cheaply furnished apartment she wears an expensive brushed gold necklace, bracelet and big pearl earrings.  The room is furnished with kitsch from Disney World and Las Vegas.  The only anomaly is a HUGE SONY TRINITRON HOME ENTERTAINMENT CENTER.  (The following is in Czech and subtitled in English.)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your sister said she didn't know where you were so you shouldn't write to her with return address if you're hiding. MILOS Did you hurt her?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know me...I never hurt anybody. Where's the money?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello, Tamina. Oleg is looking Tamina over.  Milos - though scared - barks at Oleg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take your eyes off her, Oleg! (to Emil) Look.  It wasn't my fault you two were caught. (of Oleg) It's his fault.  Trying to get the bank clerk's phone number?!  I wasn't going to wait!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milos.  Get my money! Oleg videotapes the scene.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All we see behind it is a WOMAN'S FACE and her wet hair - she obviously came from the shower and we see the towel wrapped around her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We spent it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha. Ha.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at the way we live.  I'm a plumber. You think I'd be working if I had money?! Emil, pissed, moves to a wood block and pulls out a KITCHEN KNIFE.  He grabs Tamina roughly, putting the blade to her throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Emil.  Put down the knife. Milos looks at his wife - who is terrified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Emil.  I'll help you. Milos closes the gap between him and Emil - trying to calm him by talking softly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can get you a job.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A job?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, the money is good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As a plumber?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's easy to learn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A job??  As a plumber???  You think I come to America to work!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We started over, you can too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You spent all the money while I was in prison?  Now you tell me to get a job fixing toilets?!? Emil pulls the knife away from Tamina - then angrily PLUNGES it toward Milos' chest! Oleg videotapes it.  Then lowers the camera - shocked that Emil killed Milos. Blood sprays Tamina's face.  She tries to run but Oleg grabs her, not noticing her brushed gold bracelet falls to the floor.  He covers her mouth as he points the videocamera at Emil who STABS Tamina - absolutely enraged!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: flees...Emil hears NOISE in the bedroom - a window opening. Emil kicks the bedroom door open.  Sees the window leading to the fire escape.  He dashes to it.  Sees four flights down - the WOMAN, wearing a summer dress.  Barefoot.  Her hair still wet. She looks up.  She is beautiful and terrified.  She runs down the alley.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She saw! Emil hurries toward the bathroom.  She just got out of the shower.  Her underwear and purse are draped over a chair. Emil grabs the purse.  Finds a CZECHOSLOVAKIAN PASSPORT.  He opens the cover, stares at her photo and name.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Daphne Hanlova. There's one stamp in the passport - from the U.S. when she arrived - June 16, 1998.  Underneath is written - 6 MONTH STAY.  Emil flips through the rest of the passport - all blank pages.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Six month visa.  Still here two years later.  They'll deport her if she goes to Police. Emil pockets Daphne's passport and wallet, scoops up her shoes and jacket - enters the kitchen and dumps them on the floor.  He tears through the kitchen cabinets, throwing cans and bottles aside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you looking for? Emil finds nail polish remover - looks at the bodies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to make a bohemian barbecue. Emil draws the kitchen curtains plunging the room into darkness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A face comes from the darkness.  It's an athletically handsome man, jogging out of a tunnel towards us.  He's in a tie and jacket in Central Park at NIGHT. He is JORDAN (JORDY) WARSAW.  A sensitive man of rugged honesty.  He runs down the hill in a hurry.  A MUGGER steps in his path.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Got any spare change?  How 'bout a spare twenty?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, I don't have time for you, get out of my way!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, how 'bout all your fuckin' money? The Mugger pulls a knife - and in a whirl of movement, Jordy grabs his wrist and disarms him in a deadly, professional manner - hurling him down to the pavement, twisting his arm behind his back.  With his other hand, Jordy whips out a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from his shoulder holster and places it behind the mugger's head.  Jordy displays his shield.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, you're under arrest!  Now you happy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fire Department?  Firemen don't carry guns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh yeah?  Guess again. Jordy handcuffs the Mugger and searches the Mugger's coat pockets - pulling out a handful of driver's licenses and credit cards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice - how many people you ripped off tonight?!  Get up! As Jordy yanks the Mugger to his feet, his BEEPER goes off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You couldn't listen to me, could you? Jordy drags the Mugger to a tree.  Cuffs him so his face is pressed up against the bark.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll send a cop back for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey.  C'mon, you can't leave me like this.  Some freak'll come by and stab me! Jordy jogs off across the park.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait!  Come back!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from three battalions.  Radios CRACKLE.  There's a crowd growing.  Jordy pushes his way through.  The top floor of the brownstone where Milos and Tamina lived has been reduced to smoking ruins.  The trees are covered in debris and soot.  Jordy moves to LOUIE - Battalion Chief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lieutenant - take up your line and relieve Ladder Company 60 on the top floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Louie, were you first due?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I radioed you guys right away 'cause you got two roasts on the top floor but you don't hafta investigate cause homicide is up there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Homicide?  Who let them up?  I didn't make it a crime scene yet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, it's Eddie Flemming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yo, Jordy!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - an overweight arson investigator with a quick with and good sense of humor - comes over, pulling on a turnout coat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where you been, man?  We got a celebrity!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I heard.  Who the hell let them up there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know, you think Eddie will give me his autograph?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You see anything in the crowd?  Anybody suspicious?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Naw - I'm sure the suspect's not here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh yeah, why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'Cause Eddie woulda locked him up by now!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The roof is gone.  The sky is exposed.  It's charred ruins, smoked beams and watery muck.  Eddie and Leon are standing by what's left of the mattress, looking at Milos and Tamina's charred bodies.  Eddie grips a half-smoked Cuban cigar, listening to Leon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, it looks to me - from the sixty-nine position - that they were doin' each other but were so whacked out of their heads they set the pipe on the mattress, lit it up, and they got fried.  What do you think, Eddie? Jordy enters - with Korfin who's carrying a paint can.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know.  We got the experts here. Show them what you found - I hope you don't mind, we came over to see if we could help. Korfin makes a beeline for Eddie - wanting to meet the celebrity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nah, not at all.  Detective Flemming - Bobby Korfin.  My Uncle Tony worked with you at 2-1 back when you were a rookie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could you put out the cigar?  Part of the job is picking up scents.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah?  Where?  You sure it was a knife? Uh-huh.  Really?  Okay. (to Jordy) We've got another murder - in a hotel on Eighth Avenue.  A stabbing.  Clerk said the room was rented by a Russian... Eddie's moving with Daphne's sketch. JORDY I'll come with you.

result.heading: INT.
location: DAWN CAMERA DESCENDS FROM THE SKY

direction.raw_text: Video POV of the news stand as a hand reaches into frame and picks up a copy of THE NEW YORK POST.  Eddie's photo is on the front page - holding the kitchen timer by the wires. Underneath his picture the caption reads, "DOUBLE HOMICIDE...

direction.raw_text: ."  The videocamera widens out revealing Emil standing in front of a Times Square news stand, reading the front page.  The videocamera turns around - until focusing on Oleg himself.

direction.raw_text: This is second day in America.  First day was very exciting.  Full of thrills and chills.  Over there, is co-star of my new movie, Emil! He turns the camera around - FILMING EMIL.

direction.raw_text: Who is he?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: New York's finest.  This is his case. The VENDOR - picks up People.  Stephen Geller is on the cover.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This all you want? EMIL Do you know how much killer gets for movie rights?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In here, says he wants a million.

direction.raw_text: Million?!  The killer gets one million dollars for a television interview?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, tabloids paid Ted Bundy - famous serial killer - half a million for his interview.  And how much you think Monica got for writing book about the President coming on to her?  It pays to be a killer or a whore in this country. Look, you want magazine or not?

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, son. Emil watches her walk on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The hotel room is a hive of activity.  GIL is dusting the dresser for prints.  Another officer is stripping the bed and putting the bedding into a big, clear plastic bag.  As Eddie enters the crime scene, a POLICE PHOTOGRAPHER is standing in the doorway taking pictures.

direction.raw_text: Where is she?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Takin' a bath.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tommy Cullen.  Heard a lot about you. Nice to meet you.  Here's what we got. A girl in there, figure her to be a prostitute, looks like she was fighting for her life.  She's got defense wounds on her hands.  Right this way - in the bathroom.

direction.raw_text: After you. Eddie follows Tommy into the bathroom.  There's blood splattered all over the walls and the floor.  Honey's topless body lies in the tub tangled in the bloody shower curtain. MURPHY, an Irish medical examiner (M.E.), is examining the body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Room was registered to a Francis Capra.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Capra?  That's not Czech or Russian. Who said he sounded Russian?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The clerk?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Check the switchboard, see what phone calls were made from this room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll do it. Tommy heads out.  Eddie takes out his cigar holder.  Slides out what's left of his cigar.  Re-lights it.  Looks down at Honey's body in the bathtub.  Gil's dusting the tub for prints.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Clothes were off in the other room.  Tub is dry except for the blood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any of you guys take a piss lately? Gil looks confused.  Eddie points to the toilet.  Seat is up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do the seat for me. Gil crosses to the toilet and starts to dust it.  Eddie stands in the bathroom - studying the scene.  Holding the unlit cigar.  Looking around at the blood splattered walls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only one guys checked in?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mere.  You wanna go to homicide school?  Here - make yourself useful. Eddie positions Jordy behind the tub next to the wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Our killer...our killer's standing here slashing at her.  She's fightin' him. The blood is splattering this way.  It's on this wall... (pointing to the right of Jordy) And there's some specks over here. (to the left of Jordy) There's nothing here because someone was standing right here.  Someone big.  And he's got blood on him.  Lots of blood. He wouldn't walk out of here like that. (turning to Murphy) Murphy, what kind of knife you think we're talking about here? Murphy pulls out a clear plastic ruler and walks over to the blood-splattered wall.

direction.raw_text: If you look here where he missed and hit the wall you see that the marks aren't deep but they're kinda wide... not your everyday kitchen or pocket knife.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There was only one call from this room last night.  I dialed it.  It's an escort service.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you identify yourself?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, I'm new but I'm not stupid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Call communications and get an address on that number. Tommy holds up a slip of paper with the outcall service address on it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good work.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jordy hurries out - catches up with Eddie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You goin' to the escort service?

direction.raw_text: You got any better ideas?

direction.raw_text: Mind if I ride along with you?

direction.raw_text: Okay.  I'll call it.  Heads. Jordy flips the coin and it's heads.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heads.  See, you lost twice. (beat) Okay.  Get in. Jordy goes for the passenger side of the car.  Before Jordy can get in, Eddie starts to pull away.  Jordy stands on the sidewalk - dejected.  Eddie stops the car again and this time lets Jordy get in.

direction.raw_text: Eddie and Jordy arrive in front of Rose's door.  Eddie knocks and flips a coin to Jordy.

direction.raw_text: Oh here.  A souvenir. Jordy takes the quarter.  Not understanding what Eddie means. He looks at the quarter.

direction.raw_text: Two heads.

direction.raw_text: C'mon in.  C'mon in!

We hold on Eddie and Jordy at the door.  Eddie looks around - taking in the place.  FOUR GIRLS are on phones.  Two girls take orders for customers.  The other two work the phone sex lines.  Rose hangs up the phone - turns to Eddie and Jordy:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We don't have her I.D. yet, but one of your girls was killed last night at the King Edward Hotel.

direction.raw_text: Oh my G-d.  Honey!  Honey's dead?

direction.raw_text: Yeah.  He wanted a girl from Czechoslovakia, but I sent him Honey 'cause once they get there, you know, it doesn't really matter - Honey was killed...?  Poor girl...

direction.raw_text: Well, then do it after work.  A customer's waiting. He leaves, a customer approaches.  She smiles at him - turns on the water in the sink then sees - Oleg filming her.  She backs up...suddenly moves to the emergency door!

direction.raw_text: There's a garden out there.  Daphne runs toward the alley. Oleg follows her - still videotaping.  As she rounds the corner she bumps into...Emil!  He pulls out his kitchen knife, shoving her against the wall, pushing the blade with the broken tip against her throat.

direction.raw_text: ...I have a temper. She looks at him, not understanding.  Oleg films the scene.

direction.raw_text: When I lose it, I lose control.  I didn't intend to kill Milos but he stole from me.  Cheated me!  When I went to prison, they beat me.  I still didn't tell he was my partner.  I loved Milos like a brother... The tone in Emil's voice - there's an uncharacteristic softness to it.  He wants to reconcile his behavior to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not a killer. The back door opens.  He shoves the knife in his pocket as Ludwig peers around the alleyway.  What he sees is Emil leaning close to Daphne, kissing her.

direction.raw_text: Daphne, will you be coming back to work?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In a minute, Ludwig. Ludwig leaves.

direction.raw_text: Smart girl.  I'm glad you're not a whore.  But washing hair?  This is no job for a woman as beautiful as you. They should be washing your hair. Emil reaches into his pocket and pulls out SOMETHING, sticks it in the palm of her hand, closing her fingers around it.

direction.raw_text: I don't want to kill you.  But if you talk, I will. (whispers) I thought you'd want these. He taps her hand...he turns and goes out the rear exit.  Oleg follows.  Jordy arrives.

direction.raw_text: ...Daphne? She says nothing.

direction.raw_text: I'm a fire marshal.  You remember me from the other night?  You are Daphne, right? She says nothing.  Eddie arrives.  Daphne turns.  Recognizing Eddie.

direction.raw_text: You don't have to be afraid.  We're here to protect you.  Come with me.  We want to talk to you.  You speak English alright? Eddie looks at Jordy.  Takes Daphne by the arm.

direction.raw_text: As they come out, Eddie notices Daphne clutching something in her hand.  He reaches for her hand.  Opens it.  It's a brushed gold necklace.

direction.raw_text: Did he give you these?  Was he just here? Eddie searches the streets.  Notices Oleg and Emil on the far corner.  Oleg is videotaping him.  Leon and Tommy pull up. Korfin behind.  They all pop out.  Eddie grabs Leon - squeezes his arm - quietly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The other side of the street.  The guy with the videocamera. (back to Jordy) Don't look - put her in the car. (to Leon) Stay this side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay with her. They start heading down the curb - trying not to attract the attention of Oleg and Emil.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: -UP of the scene from across the corner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Put the fuckin' camera down!  Let's go! Emil starts to flee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What follows next is an incredible foot chase with Eddie, Jordy, Korfin and Leon running through traffic - chasing Emil.  Eddie tries to stay in the lead but is running out of breath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Split up! Jordy runs down one side of Madison - Eddie, the other. Korfin continues down 62nd and Leon covers the other side. They search for Emil, grabbing people, turning them around, missing him.  Emil seems to have disappeared. Leon, gun raised, approaches the cafe.  As he rounds the corner, Emil darts out, cracking Leon across the face!  Leon crashes into a table, dropping his gun.  Emil scoops up the gun and PISTOL-WHIPS Leon.  BEATING the detective to a pulp. People are running from the scene.  Emil takes Leon's wallet. He is distracted by LAUGHTER.  Oleg is VIDEOTAPING the scene.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Emil, look! Oleg swivels with the videocamera.  Korfin is running toward them - pushing through the crowd.  Emil FIRES!  Korfin is blown backwards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perfect!  Cut.  Print! Eddie arrives.  Bends down to Leon, whose face is red with blood.  Jordy runs to Korfin, who's laying in the street, shot in the side.  Jordy cradles his partner.

direction.raw_text: Are you hit?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.  I'm okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bobby, Bobby!  Where're you hit?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It hurts.  Aw, Jesus!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lay down.  Stay down, Bobby. Jordy looks up as Eddie steps into the center of the street. Cars screech out of the way!  Eddie crouches, taking aim at Emil, who is almost two blocks away.  It's an impossible shot, out of range. But Eddie closes an eye, aims and squeezes off one SHOT.  Two blocks away, Emil topples.  Korfin and Jordy look at Eddie, astonished he made the shot.  Emil scrambles to his feet. Runs.  Eddie holsters his weapon.  Pulls out a handkerchief. Dabs Leon's wounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He got my gun!  Motherfucker was filming the whole time!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know.  Relax.  Take it easy.  Don't worry, we'll get those fuckers.

Daphne can be seen waiting in the back of the restaurant, maybe twenty feet away.  Tommy stands next to her.  This is where Eddie and Jordy are headed.

direction.raw_text: I understand, but I noticed that the Fire Marshall is here with you.  Is this somehow related to the fire department?

direction.raw_text: Okay.  But I do understand that your partner, Leon Jackson's been injured. Is that correct?

direction.raw_text: He was hurt, but not seriously.  He'll be fine.

direction.raw_text: Do you have the suspect in custody?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Um...now is not a good time, okay. Detective Jackson's hurt.  He's fine. I've got a Fire Marshall shot, Detective Jackson is hurt but not seriously.

direction.raw_text: Alright, cut, cut, cut. Mike the cameraman cuts the cameraman - lowers it from his shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eddie, are you okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.  Now's not a good time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright.

direction.raw_text: Alright?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright.

direction.raw_text: Alright.

direction.raw_text: Arrest you for what?  Why would we arrest you? She still hesitates.

direction.raw_text: What are you hiding?  Why are you afraid
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She just saw two of her friends killed! They probably threatened her.

Emil grabs some toilet paper, plugs the wound, then cuts the towel off the dispenser with his kitchen knife and wraps his ankle.  He grits teeth in pain.  The lights go out.  Then Oleg adjusts the fluorescent light above the sink.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where the hell is he?  Goddamn it?! Jordy glares at Emil.  Emil looks back at Jordy, gloating. Smiles.  He won.  He beat the system.  Jordy suddenly erupts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think this is funny??  What the hell are you laughing at? Emil stares down Jordy.  Jordy grips the gun inside the jacket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Officer, keep this man back, he's assaulted my client on previous occasions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: blocks Jordy from Emil.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is it?  This bastard kills the best cop this city ever had and we do nothing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You may not like it marshal, but that's the law.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And what about the other victims??  What about their families?  He'll end up in some country club nuthouse while his lawyer sells his rights to the movies and we just stand here and do nothing? We let this scumbag walk? Jordy moves past the officer.  Emil breaks away from Cutler. Gets in Jordy's face.  Laughs quietly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be careful.  I can kill you.  I'm insane. Jordy shoves Emil into Cutler.  A scuffle breaks out as the cops separate the two - pulling Jordy back as we cut to:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as it approaches Hawkins from behind.  A hand dips into frame tapping Hawkins on the shoulder.  Hawkins turns - sees who he's been waiting for.  His face lights up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought you wouldn't show up.  Where is it?  Where is the tape?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In disguise - sunglasses and a hat.  Holding his videocamera.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's all in here.  All in here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: has been separated from Cutler and Emil as Hawkins' voice cuts above the din of the crowd, announcing excitedly:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait a minute, Bruce!  We've got some interesting evidence, something you should look at! Reporters turn as Hawkins speaks.  His crew is taping as he continues introducing his broadcast:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have exclusive rights to the ORIGINAL UNCUT videotape shot by Oleg Razgul, proving Emil Slovak was not insane! Hard to believe...watch! Reporters swing their cameras over as Oleg holds his videocamera up in the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He knew exactly what he was doing - all of this was planned!  It's all here in my movie.  Emil is not insane.  Look. Look! Oleg PLAYS his videocamera as lenses focus, we see excerpts of the moment where Emil explains to Eddie:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...so we kill someone famous and if we are caught, we are sent to mental hospital...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Officers, there's your killer, do your duty, arrest him! The police are attempting to get to Oleg, but a sea of reporters separate them.  We hear the staccato calls from the press corps.  Nicolette looks on in amazed outrage.  Jordy notices and starts moving towards her.  Before the POLICE CAPTAIN in charge of the detail can react, the rage which killed Milos, Tamina and Honey wells up inside Emil.  He yells at Oleg!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Traitor!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.  You are the traitor.  You are murderer.  I am director.  Action! Oleg pulls his gun.  Emil pulls Cutler in front of him as:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Oleg FIRES!  Cutler is SHOT and goes down.  Hawkins swings his camera over to Oleg - filming the would-be assassin. Oleg FIRES off another SHOT - hitting the COURT OFFICER escorting Emil.  Emil grabs the down officer's gun.  He swivels - rapid fires at Oleg.  Oleg topples.  People are screaming.  It's CHAOS. Emil darts forward - grabbing Nicolette who is closes to him. He puts his handcuffed arms over her head - points the gun at her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drop the gun!  DON'T SHOOT!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll kill her!  Back off!  Everyone back away from me! We hear Jordy's voice above Emil.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let her go.  Let her fucking go!! The captain is screaming at all his men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one shoot!  Lower your weapons!  Do not fire!  No officer will fire his weapon unless I say so! (to Emil) Let the woman go! Cops reluctantly lower their weapons.  But Jordy is still aiming his gun at Emil.  He is the only one who hasn't lowered his gun.  The captain is yelling at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Holster your weapons!  Back away.  That is an order!  No officers will fire! Emil is screaming back at the captain as Jordy screams at Emil.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell him to put his gun down!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let her go!  Let her go!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If he doesn't lower his gun I'll fucking kill her. Jordy doesn't lower his gun.  Emil tries to back away.  The reporters - who have ducked and covered - are still keeping their lenses pointed at the scene.  This is great film! Jordy follows after Emil - his gun raised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let her go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shoot!  Shoot him!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut up! Meanwhile, the captain is still yelling:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No on shoot!  No one shoot!!  No officer will follow.  No officer will shoot! Nicolette is still encouraging Jordy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shoot!  Shoot!  Shoot him!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut up! Everyone is screaming at once.  It's mass chaos.  The captain is trying to keep everyone calm.  Cops following along with their weapons lowered.  All except Jordy - his gun still pointed at Emil. Hawkins can't believe what footage he's getting.  He's pushing his cameraman to the front of the pack.  Trying to get the best coverage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll surrender!! I'll surrender if he lowers his gun. He's pointing at Jordy but he's continuing to back away towards the police boat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't.  Don't let him surrender.  Shoot him! Jordy won't take his gun off him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let her go.  Let her go. The captain is yelling at Jordy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lower your weapon.  I told you - lower your weapon! Jordy struggles to get a clean shot at Emil.  He can't.  His heart pounding.  Adrenaline pumping.  He suddenly lowers his weapon.  Turns away.  The captain visibly relaxes.  Emil laughs.  Jordy suddenly turns back.  Quickly raises his weapon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Emil takes a shot in the leg.  Nicolette ducks under the handcuffs and scurries away.  Emil looks at Jordy - surprised he shot him.  Jordy FIRES AGAIN.  Emil is hit in the shoulder.  Jordy marches forward, EMPTYING HIS CLIP in Emil's chest.  Abdomen.  Head.  Gun fire echoes in the humid air as Emil stumbles back.  Does a funny dance and drops to the ground.  Dead.  The captain yells.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told you not to shoot!  No officers should shoot. Jordy quietly answers:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not a cop.  I'm a fire marshal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's still alive. Hawkins looks down at Oleg.  He is sprawled on the ground. His videocamera in hand - he's still making the movie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as it ZOOMS from the Statue of Liberty and PANS to Oleg.  He looks in the lens with his dying eyes, gasps:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A film...by Oleg Razgul. And Oleg dies but suddenly his eyes pop WIDE OPEN.  Hawkins jumps back, Oleg smiles, coughing in pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How was that? Oleg's head rolls to one side.  Now dead.  Nicolette runs over to Jordy.  Composing herself.  Coming together.  Glad Emil is dead.  Jordy starts to walk away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait a minute.  Where are you going? Learn from Eddie.  Talk to the court of public opinion.  Take the credit, you need it. She turns him around.  Straightens his tie.  Starts to push the hair out of his face but he stops her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No thanks. Jordy puts something in her hand.  She looks down.  It's
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .  The one Jordy took out of Daphne's bathroom. She looks up at him.  Her cameraman rolling.  The lens pointed at Jordy.  Jordy looks at Nicolette.  Meets her eyes. He doesn't want to make a statement.  He still doesn't want the fame.  He did learn from Eddie.  Eddie was killed because he was a celebrity.  Jordy wants no part of it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cut. Her cameraman lowers his leans.  Jordy smiles.  She nods. Jordy turns and walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get a shot of him leaving.  Then pan to me. Jordy disappears into the sea of people.  The camera PANS back to Nicolette.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, he wouldn't talk to us, but you saw it. The CAMERA PULLS BACK from Nicolette's face and the video is now on:
direction.name: direction
